q1: How do I convert meters to feet?
a1: Enter the value in meters, select meters as the from unit and feet as the to unit. 1 meter equals approximately 3.281 feet.
a2: Millimeters, centimeters, meters, kilometers, inches, feet, yards, miles, and nautical miles.
a3: Yes, we use precise conversion factors. Results are shown with up to 8 decimal places.
q4: Can I see all conversions at once?
a4: Yes, once you enter a value, all unit conversions are displayed in a table below.
